contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Niiharu'''|新治村|Niiharu-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Tone District, Gunma|Tone District]], [[Gunma Prefecture|Gunma]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2005 Niihari, along with the town of [[Tsukiyono, Gunma|Tsukiyono]], also from [[Tone District, Gunma|Tone District]], was merged into the expanded town of [[Minakami, Gunma|Minakami]]. [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Gunma Prefecture]] {{Gunma-geo-stub}}
